dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Name’s Heathcliff. Clobbering people is my specialty. ‘Course, only when I fancy it.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Keep that clock away from my face… It’s irritating.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: What? Expecting me to ask what scran you had for lunch or some mince?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Now stop your gob. If you’re thinking of ordering more training or missions, you’d best think twice.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Just ‘cause you’re the manager doesn’t mean you get to lecture me or shove me into shoddy plans. I don’t follow anyone’s orders.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Don’t you ever get curious about what’s on the other side of that clock on your shoulders, mate? Hahah, I was just taking the piss. What’s got you shaking like timber?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: No need for long gabs between us. Not about to turn down an exchange of punches, though.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Right, so you wanna get smacked, ey? Stay right there.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I was craving a workout. Time to smash stuff right up!

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Don’t make it long, I’m going in!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: What? Why?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Already there!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Haha, how do ya like that?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Grh…!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Piss easy.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: What? When’d you get smashed to bits?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: What’s that proud look? I’m the one who dealt with it.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: …This is really narking me. Didn’t I tell you to get someone else?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Well, don’t wanna giggle over small victories.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Heh, see that? I did a real bang up job!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Bugger all, this’s got me pure raging! You ain’t gonna let this go, right, mate?
